Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to compensation for directors of the regional off-track betting corporation
Summary: Relates to compensation for directors of the regional off-track betting corporation; requires regional off-track betting corporations to report on actual use and implementation of the approved marketing promotion plan from the previous year, which shall include the name and address of each person receiving any promotional item or thing of value in excess of fifty dollars.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Amd ยง502, RWB L; amd 1617-a, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law and the tax law, in relation to compensation for directors of the regional off-track betting corporation
